english: Where were you this whole week?
How much time did you take?
I want to buy new clothes
Where will you go on vacation?
I went out with my friends
You're the one who told me
Bring me a glass of water
I went to the doctor yesterday
I waited for you a lot
What do you want to eat?
I don't know where I put it
Can I take a picture with you?
Do you have some time left?
Don't worry, everything will be fine

lebanese.phrase: ما تخاف، كلشي رح يكون منيح
lebanese.latin: ma tkhaf, kellshi rah ykon mnih

syrian.phrase: ما تخاف، كلشي رح يكون منيح
syrian.latin: ma tkhaf, kellshi rah ykon mnih

msa.phrase: لا تقلق، كل شيء سيكون بخير
msa.latin: la taqlaq, kullu shay' sayakun bikhayr

english: I have a surprise for you
I didn't want to bother you
This is my first time coming here
I don't have it with me
I was going to tell you
What do you think of it?
Don't forget to bring with you
How do you spend your time?
I have something important to tell you
